alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 3:16AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon
